title: Principles of Modern Operating Systems 2nd c2013 Garrido txtbk
description:
Principles of Modern Operating Systems, 2nd Edition (c2013), textbook by Jose M. Garrido, Richard Schlesinger & Kenneth Hoganson.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.jblearning.com/catalog/9781449626341/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.jblearning.com/catalog/9781449626341/</a>

CONTENTS:
---------
1. Basic Concepts of Operating Systems
2. Processes and Threads
3. System Performance and Models
4. Systems with Multiprogramming
5. Processor Scheduling
6. Synchronization Principles
7. Deadlocks
8. File Management
9. The I/O System
10. Memory Management
11. Security and Protection
12. Networking and Distributed Systems
13. Virtual Machines
APPENDICES:
A: Introduction to Using Linux
B: Java and POSIX Threads
C: The Java Modeling Framework
D: Psim3
E: Overview of Probability Theory
F: Using the C++ Models
G: The Computer System: An Overview

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, "scanned from screen" PDF (27 MB) with OCR (nicely executed; hats off to the scan guys).
compressed (zipped): *right-click* the filename (.7z) & choose *Extract* to convert to PDF; discard the .7z file (container) when done with seeding.
